Articles.Content:
my name is akh101 and i'm now getting to the forums and such and still a little confuse on how thing work around here:confused:

so but any way i'm a good aerospace plane maker and rockets that manly orbit kerbin

but i'm working on new stuff and hope to post some of it on the forms

let see if i can use my mad building skills in to some crazy things

see you in spaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaace!

Welcome to the forums akh101.

We always need new people making rockets and planes for this community that just passed 50,000 members so there is plenty of people to make things for.

Looking forward to see your designs about.

Welcome Akh101 !

I hope you enjoy your stay everyone on here is friendly and very helpful

Hiya akh101, welcome to the community

I'm looking forwards to seeing what you make, have fun on the forums and go launch some rockets
